name: BEANSTALKERS
description:
"Ah! Another day of Agriculture, free of consequences for my deeply unethical flora-transfiguration studies."

"It is truly a relief that nothing has happened to my precious beanstalks. If some sort of Monster were to lay their hand on them I would just DIE."

"Whatever could that commotion be?"

"Oh Dear..."

Fend off Foes and Protect your Crops!

Swing your Scythe and hit Corpses to Harvest orbs!

Collect Gold to upgrade!

Spend orbs to cast Spells and build Defenses!

Let us know what Wave you got to in the comments section!
